channel.title: redux on Evert Timberg
channel.description: Recent content in redux on Evert Timberg

item.title: Thoughts on Redux
item.description: Redux is a state management library that is commonly used in React apps. Redux was created in 2015 and almost immediately became a common sight in React apps. This may have been due to the fact that many of the React docs assumed that Redux was installed along with the popularity of boilerplates that included Redux by default. As a result of this, many front-end developers including myself, incorrectly assumed that React had to be used with Redux.
